Epworth Project

Harare, Zimbabwe

This map shows a block in the Epworth neighborhood, a suburb of Harare, Zimbabwe. The parcel data was collected by neighborhood residents in collaboration with the Zimbabwe Homeless People's Federation and Dialogue on Shelter, which are federations of Shack/Slum Dwellers International (SDI). Black lines show streets and paths. Orange outlines parcels with no direct access to streets. Parcels with street access are outlined in grey.
